params._admin: address to receive the administratorship of the contract

params.administrationAddress: address of the Administration smart contract
params.initialFirstGrowthThreshold: value of the initial first growth threshold
params.initialSecondGrowthThreshold: value of the initial second growth threshold

params._admin: address to have the administratorship of the contract revoked

params._user: address that has to have stage updated

givePraise(address,string).details: user can not give praise to selfusregistered users can not receive or give praises

params._user: address to receive the registered user rights of the contract

setGrowthThresholds(uint256,uint256).details: if input value is set to 0, then the threshold value is not updated

params._firstGrowth: value to be set for first growth threshold
params._secondGrowth: value to be set for second growth threshold

params._newOwner: address to receive the ownership of the contract

params._user: address to loose the registered user rights of the contract

params._praiseId: ID of the praise we are retrieving
params._user: address of the user whoose data we are looking at
address of the user whoose data we are looking at

returns._1: Stage stage that the user reached
returns.totalNumberOfPraises: number of praises that the user received

appointAdmin(address).notice: used to appoin administrator of the contract

demoteAdmin(address).notice: used to demote administrator of the contract

emergencyStop().notice: used to stop the operation of the contract

forceUpdateOfUserStage(address).notice: used to force the update od the stage of the user is the growth params have been changed and the user stage should be higher

givePraise(address,string).notice: used to give praise from one user to another

registerUser(address).notice: used to register user of the contract

resumeOperation().notice: used to resume the operation of the contract

setGrowthThresholds(uint256,uint256).notice: used to set new growth thresholds

transferOwnership(address).notice: used to transfer ownership of the contract

unregisterUser(address).notice: used to unregister user of the contract

viewUserPraiseData(address).notice: used to view user praise data
